law.catch_line: Centralized statewide information and referral program for grandparents and other caregivers caring for minors who are not their biological children.

text.section: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall create a centralized statewide service program that provides information and referrals through a statewide toll-free telephone number to grandparents and other caregivers who are caring for minors who are not their biological children.
The cabinet may coordinate this program with the KyCARES Program.
This program shall be known as the KinCare Support Program.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 198, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006.
